rules_text:
[i](As a Conquest enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, put it onto the battlefield transformed.)[/i]
When Battle for the Dead Strait enters the battlefield, search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. You
lose 2 life.
rules_text2:
{T}: Add {B}.
{1}{B}, {T}: Exile the top five cards of your library, then search your library for a card, shuffle, and put that card on top.
